News

Parent Council Annual General Meeting

September 11, 2019 admin

The AGM of the Parent Council will take place at 7pm on Wednesday, 18th September at Partickhill Bowling Club, 46 Partickhill Road (at the top of Gardner Street).  All welcome! Please come along and support the Parent Council.
